understanding.C: We will snapshot the READY status of the Knative Service metrics-echo, generate a minimal Markdown report at reports/metrics-echo/metrics_echo_ready_status_p3-2.md, commit it on a dedicated branch, push to origin, and open a PR titled 'Reports: add metrics-echo READY snapshot for P3-2', linking Issue #774.

acceptance: This will create the report from the live metrics-echo KService, commit it on a new branch, push it, and open a PR linking Issue #774.
